description: v2.14: Added Professional Services product area (consulting, done-for-you, training) + improved signature quality guidelines to reduce generic signatures

url_context_mapping._comment: Maps Intercom source.url patterns to Product Areas for disambiguating vague messages. Three schedulers: Pin Scheduler (Next Publisher, Pinterest-only new), Legacy Publisher (Pinterest-only old), Multi-Network (cross-platform).

signature_quality_guidelines._comment: Examples of good vs bad signatures to guide LLM theme extraction

good_examples.why: Specific error type (encoding) within CSV import
Specific error (permission denied) for specific action (board access)
Clear failure in specific publishing flow
Specific scheduler (multi-network) with clear failure mode

bad_examples.why_bad: Too generic - what specific setting? What problem?
Generic 'question' - what specific aspect of scheduling?
Completely generic - no product area or problem specified
Just restates category - not specific about what user needs
Generic 'question' - which integration? What about it?

product_area_mapping._comment: Terminology: THREE SCHEDULERS - Next Publisher = Pin Scheduler (Pinterest-only, new), Legacy Publisher = Original Publisher (Pinterest-only, old), Multi-Network = cross-platform scheduler (Pinterest/Instagram/Facebook). Product Dashboard = e-commerce integration (Shopify). CoPilot = Planning tool. GW Labs = Ghostwriter. Made For You vs SmartPin = both AI content, different features. Create = Tailwind Create design tool.

pinterest_publishing_failure.description: Pins scheduled but not posting to Pinterest - API errors, auth failures, or silent failures
example_intents: My pins are scheduled but never post to Pinterest
Pins showing as scheduled but nothing appears on my boards
pinterest_publishing_failure.engineering_fix: Pinterest API integration, OAuth refresh, error handling, retry logic

pinterest_connection_failure.description: Cannot connect or reconnect Pinterest account - OAuth flow failures
example_intents: I can't connect my Pinterest account
Getting an error when trying to authorize Pinterest
pinterest_connection_failure.engineering_fix: OAuth flow, token refresh, Pinterest API permissions

ghostwriter_generation_failure.description: AI generation fails with error, times out, or produces garbled/truncated output
example_intents: Ghostwriter keeps failing with an error
The AI generated gibberish text
Lost credits due to errors
ghostwriter_generation_failure.engineering_fix: OpenAI API integration, error handling, retry logic, response parsing

ghostwriter_output_mismatch.description: AI generates coherent but wrong content - ignores input, off-topic, wrong tone/format
example_intents: The AI completely ignored what I asked for
Generated content about wrong topic
Asked for kids party, got wedding description
ghostwriter_output_mismatch.engineering_fix: Prompt templates, context injection, model parameters, few-shot examples

ghostwriter_usage_guidance.description: User needs help understanding how to use AI features effectively
example_intents: How do I use Ghostwriter?
What's the best way to write prompts?

billing_flow_error.description: User encounters errors or blocks when trying to cancel, upgrade, or change plan
example_intents: I keep getting an error when trying to cancel
The cancel button doesn't work
billing_flow_error.engineering_fix: Billing flow bugs, Stripe integration, error handling, state management

billing_unexpected_charge.description: User charged when they shouldn't be - after cancellation, wrong amount, duplicate charge, failed payment still charged
example_intents: I was charged after I cancelled
I got charged twice
Payment failed but I was still charged
billing_unexpected_charge.engineering_fix: Billing logic, subscription state management, Stripe webhooks, payment reconciliation

billing_cancellation_request.description: User wants to cancel subscription - no error, just needs to do it or needs help finding it
example_intents: I want to cancel my subscription
How do I cancel?
billing_cancellation_request.engineering_fix: Self-service cancellation flow visibility, UI clarity, confirmation UX

billing_plan_change_request.description: User wants to upgrade, downgrade, or change their plan
example_intents: I want to downgrade to the free plan
How do I upgrade?
Can I switch plans?
billing_plan_change_request.engineering_fix: Plan change flow, proration logic, UI for plan comparison

billing_refund_request.description: User requesting refund for any reason
example_intents: I want a refund
Can I get my money back?
billing_refund_request.engineering_fix: Refund policy clarity, self-service refund flow, support process automation

billing_settings_guidance.description: User needs help with billing settings - update card, change address, view invoices, renewal date
example_intents: How do I update my credit card?
Where can I see my invoices?
When does my subscription renew?

I want to delete my account

csv_import_failure.description: CSV upload fails - parsing errors, column mapping issues, validation failures

Column mapping failed

Posts aren't cross-posting to Facebook
Auto-post to Facebook stopped working

scheduling_failure.description: Scheduled content doesn't post at the right time or at all in Next Publisher (Pin Scheduler) - drag/drop issues, interval pins, queue problems

Drag and drop is running slow
Interval pins don't show the date
scheduling_failure.engineering_fix: Next Publisher scheduler reliability, queue processing, timezone handling, UI performance

scheduling_failure_legacy.description: Scheduled content doesn't post at the right time or at all in Legacy Publisher (Original Publisher) - fill empty time slots, drafts issues, your schedule problems

Dates in legacy Your Schedule are off
scheduling_failure_legacy.engineering_fix: Legacy Publisher scheduler reliability, auto-fill logic, draft management

Getting an error when I try to sign in

example_intents: My account has been suspended
I'm locked out of my account
Says my account is disabled
account_locked_or_suspended.engineering_fix: Account suspension policies, appeal process, clear communication, unlock flow

social_account_reconnection.description: User needs to reconnect disconnected social account (Pinterest, Instagram, Facebook) - OAuth expired or revoked
example_intents: My Instagram account disconnected
Need to reconnect Pinterest
Says I need to reauthorize my Facebook page
social_account_reconnection.engineering_fix: OAuth token refresh, expiration handling, reconnection UX, clearer error messages

account_email_change.description: User wants to change account email address or username
example_intents: How do I change my email address?
I want to update my account email

account_email_change.engineering_fix: Email change flow, verification process, self-service options

service_downtime_signup.description: User unable to sign up due to temporary service downtime or outage - not a user error
example_intents: I'm getting an error when trying to sign up
Sign up page isn't working
Can't create my account
service_downtime_signup.engineering_fix: Service reliability, signup flow error handling, status page, downtime notifications
service_downtime_signup.support_solution: Try signing up again now that the issue has been resolved

account_deletion_request.description: User wants to permanently delete account and remove all data - requires downloading drafts/create files first
example_intents: I want to delete my account
Can you remove my profile?
How do I close my account?
account_deletion_request.engineering_fix: Self-service account deletion, data export flow, confirm data download before deletion
account_deletion_request.support_solution: Support offered to remove the profile after customer downloads drafts/create files

multi_account_switching.description: User needs help switching between multiple connected accounts in dashboard
example_intents: How do I switch to my other account?
Can I change between accounts?
I have multiple accounts, how do I switch?
multi_account_switching.engineering_fix: Account switcher UI discoverability, clearer navigation, account selection
multi_account_switching.support_solution: Instructions on how to hover over menu bar to switch accounts

instagram_oauth_multi_account.description: User unable to connect desired Instagram account due to Single Sign-On pulling primary account instead
example_intents: It's connecting the wrong Instagram account
I want to connect a different Instagram profile
Instagram keeps connecting my personal instead of business
instagram_oauth_multi_account.engineering_fix: Instagram OAuth account selection, multi-account support, clearer UI for account choice
instagram_oauth_multi_account.support_solution: Use incognito browser to sign in to Instagram and connect desired profile, or contact Facebook/Instagram Support
instagram_oauth_multi_account.root_cause: Authentication process pulls primary account information due to same login credentials for multiple accounts

pinterest_org_conflict.description: User cannot connect Pinterest account because it's already linked to different Tailwind organization
example_intents: Says my Pinterest account is already assigned
Can't connect Pinterest, it's linked to another org

pinterest_org_conflict.engineering_fix: Account unlinking flow, organization transfer, clearer error messages, self-service account migration
pinterest_org_conflict.root_cause: Account is already linked to a different organization, preventing the connection

session_clearing_required.description: User needs to clear session to fix login/access issues - common troubleshooting step
example_intents: I'm stuck in a login loop
Can't get past login page

session_clearing_required.engineering_fix: Session management, auto-clear stale sessions, better browser compatibility, clearer logout flow
session_clearing_required.support_solution: Visit clear session link and log back in, or try using a different web browser
